files.patch:
@@ -1735,3 +1735,0 @@ -

When installation is complete, configure the build using the same -command used with a full Visual Studio installation:

-
bash configure --with-boot-jdk=$BOOT_JDK
@@ -1739,6 +1736,3 @@ -machine, the target platform needs to be set to -aarch64-unknown-cygwin to enable cross compilation. -Configure the build with --openjdk-target:

-
bash configure \
-  --with-boot-jdk=$BOOT_JDK \
-  --openjdk-target=aarch64-unknown-cygwin
+machine, you must set the proper target platform by adding +--openjdk-target=aarch64-unknown-cygwin to your configure +command line.

@@ -1474,7 +1474,0 @@
-When installation is complete, configure the build using the same command used
-with a full Visual Studio installation:
-
-```
-bash configure --with-boot-jdk=$BOOT_JDK
-```

@@ -1482,1 +1475,1 @@
-you must set the proper target platform by adding 
+you must set the proper target platform by adding
